description: AMENDMENT NO. 002This amendment is raised to answer Bidders’ questions andmodify the RFP.AMENDMENT NO. 001This amendment is raised to modify the Request for Proposal (RFP)._________________________________________________________________________Centralised Printing Services (CPS)\\) – Printing Services for File Folders, Applications, Info sheets and KitsEmployment Social Development Canada (ESDC) requires services for the supply of a variety of printing materials including printing and assembling of the Canada Pension Plan kits. The printed materials includes but not limited to: ESDC and Service Canada file folders, applications and info sheet, as well as shipping services to have the printed products distributed to ESDC offices and other locations across Canada.The Contractor must print and deliver all items in full quantities, according to Statement of Work (SOW) The Contractor must accept and More Imational features So live inc Also perf the print producos destinati...
